薴字的基本解释

薴
níng
见“苧2”。

薴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［níng］
［《廣韻》女耕切，平耕，娘。］
(1)散乱貌。
(2)见“薺薴”。
(3)有机化合物。液状，具有柠檬香味。可用作香料或合成橡胶、纤维的原料。

薴字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薴； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1062第50
【唐韻】女耕切，音儜。【說文】?薴，草亂貌也。　又薺薴，藥名。又石薺薴，生山石閒。

薴字的源字形

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［níng］
["Guangyun" female ploughing cut, flat ploughing, mother. ]
(1) Scattered appearance.
(2) See "Shepherd's purse".
(3) Organic compounds. Liquid, with lemon scent. It can be used as a raw material for perfume or synthetic rubber and fiber.
薴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zhezi] 　薴; Kangxi strokes: 20; Page number: page 1062 to 50
[Tang Yun] The female farming and cutting, the sound is 儜. [Speaking of text]? You, have a messy appearance.　 and water chestnut, the name of the medicine. And Shimozu, where the mountains and rocks are idle.
